example-learning-objective.text: Prose we want to show up in the lesson.
example-learning-objective.assessment-rec: author notes about how it might be assessed.

functions-domain-range.text: Demonstrate understanding of Domain and Range and how they relate to Functions.

function-application.text: Identify the value that applying a function (e.g. f(3)) produces from symbolic definitions, tables, or graphs.

function-comp-ooo.text: Describe the order of operations involved in algebraic function compositions.
